articles.description: Shareholders of the two companies voted to join forces in an effort to cope with a major technology shift and plummeting sales.
articles.content: Bruno Le Maire, the French economics and finance minister, and Stefano Patuanelli, his Italian counterpart, said in a joint statement that they warmly welcome the merger, which will create a new Euro… [+1569 chars]

articles.title: As America returns to work in the new year, Slack addresses outages - NBC News
articles.description: Slack, one of the world’s most popular online chat tools, went down for users around the world for several hours Monday morning due to an undisclosed issue, the company said.
articles.content:
